title: The bucket List
content:
The bucket List
I woke up groggily, plugged in my phone, which had shut down due to a power outage, and turned it back on. Around 10 a.m.—still early for a single person on a weekend.
[迷迷糊糊中醒来，将停电关机的手机插上充电线后开机，10 点左右，对于一个单身人士的周末来说，时间还早。]
After spending two or three hours on a video streaming site, I threw my dirty clothes into the washing machine and picked up my takeout.
[在视频网站耗费两三个小时后，将脏衣服丢进洗衣机，拿到外卖。]
After eating, drowsiness hit me, and my stomach felt uncomfortably full. So I drew the curtains, shutting out the good weather outside, grabbed my laptop, and got back into bed to continue watching videos.
[饭后，困意袭来，肚子又很胀，于是拉上窗帘，隔离了窗外的好天气，抱着笔记本来到床上继续刷视频。]
I came across a movie analysis video featuring a familiar Black actor—the one many people call God.
[看到了一个讲解电影的视频，主角是一个熟悉的黑人演员，就是很多人都叫他“上帝”的那个。]
The movie is called The Bucket List. It’s a great film, and its theme resonates with the book I read a few days ago—5 Types of Wealth. Both explore what truly matters in life.
[电影的名字叫《遗愿清单》，是个不错的电影，内容跟前两天看的书——《5 Types of Wealth》呼应上了，都是讲述人生中什么是重要的事情。]
OK, that’s it. I just remembered the clothes in the washing machine—I hope they don’t have claustrophobia.
[OK，就是这样了，我想起了洗衣机里的衣服，希望它们没有幽闭恐惧症。]

sentences.text: I woke up groggily, plugged in my phone, which had shut down due to a power outage, and turned it back on. Around 10 a.m.—still early for a single person on a weekend.
迷迷糊糊中醒来，将停电关机的手机插上充电线后开机，10 点左右，对于一个单身人士的周末来说，时间还早。
After spending two or three hours on a video streaming site, I threw my dirty clothes into the washing machine and picked up my takeout.
在视频网站耗费两三个小时后，将脏衣服丢进洗衣机，拿到外卖。

After eating, drowsiness hit me, and my stomach felt uncomfortably full. So I drew the curtains, shutting out the good weather outside, grabbed my laptop, and got back into bed to continue watching videos.
饭后，困意袭来，肚子又很胀，于是拉上窗帘，隔离了窗外的好天气，抱着笔记本来到床上继续刷视频。
I came across a movie analysis video featuring a familiar Black actor—the one many people call God.
看到了一个讲解电影的视频，主角是一个熟悉的黑人演员，就是很多人都叫他“上帝”的那个。
The movie is called The Bucket List. It’s a great film, and its theme resonates with the book I read a few days ago—5 Types of Wealth. Both explore what truly matters in life.
电影的名字叫《遗愿清单》，是个不错的电影，内容跟前两天看的书——《5 Types of Wealth》呼应上了，都是讲述人生中什么是重要的事情。
OK, that’s it. I just remembered the clothes in the washing machine—I hope they don’t have claustrophobia.
OK，就是这样了，我想起了洗衣机里的衣服，希望它们没有幽闭恐惧症。
